name: International Conference on Biomedical Electronic Systems and NanoDevices ICBSN 2022
content: The main purpose of ICBSN 2022 is to bring together researchers and practitioners from electronics and related areas who are interested in developing, studying and using innovative devices and systems inspired by biological systems and addressing the emerging biomedical requirements. Monitoring and diagnostic devices, sensors and systems, biorobotics, nano devices and technologies including micro systems and biomaterials are some of the technologies addressed at this conference. The fabrication and application of biodevices, including wearable and implantable devices is also addressed.
